task.title: Conref file: Installing
task.shortdesc: If you already have locally-installed copies of Ant and the other required tools, install either the minimal or standard package.

prereq.p:
Ensure that you have the following prerequisite software installed:
Ant, version or later
Java runtime environment or development kit, version or later
XSLT processor. You can use either Saxon, version or later, or Xalan-J, version or later.
In addition, determine the specific DITA-OT transformations that you intend to support and ensure that you have the prerequisite software installed for them.
For more information, see and Tested platforms and tools.

step.cmd: Download the minimal or standard package from SourceForge.
step.info: For production use, we recommend that you use the latest stable release.

step.cmd: Extract the contents of the package into an installation directory.
